subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption 	I will go no further!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Once you get to know Frank S, his comments don't bother you.
;-)

A lot of us don't care for Moon.

Zack

On Fri, Jun 5, 2009 at 10:52 AM, eamonn mgherbi
<eamonnmgherbi@...>wrote:

>
>
>   Wow first of all dont swear on here and wind your neck in!
>
> Now I have to admit I didnt mean you I was talking about Chris moon but
> hell im at work and im trying to do 2 things at once.
>
> I have been following this group for a year and from the message i wrote
> this is the first time I got a reply. Now Frank I think you work is quality
> and I definately want to learn more about your work and what you do. and if
> you could advise me of where I can see a profile of yourself that would be
> great. but dont start with the abusive crap towards me.
>
> Lets keep it clean. Again I was talking about Moon. not you Frank, iv read
> my message over and i definately worded it wrong. Im just not a big fan of
> Chris Moon.
>
> And the religious crap thing also wind your neck in about that, that was a
> pretty crappy thing first of all im not religious it just causes war. second
> of all I want to know more about your work.
>
>  ------------------------------
> *From:* Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
> *To:* EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> *Sent:* Friday, 5 June, 2009 16:25:28
> *Subject:* Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank
> sumption I will go no further!
>
>    Arrogant!? Lets see, I don't do shows, I'm not on podcast every
> friggin' day proclaiming my expertness, I don't charge money-for anything, I
> share all information and schematics, and I do not kiss anyone's ass, guess
> that must be so egotistical of me.  Arrogant!?, who is the f--- is the
> duffus out there with the high priest mentality?  The really sad part is
> trhe brain dead dorks that follow these clowns. Haliday proclaimed himself
> box expert extraordinaire, and there's those sorry twits that eat up
> everyword. There are no box/paranormal experts, no one knows how this shit
> works. Go to church if you want a religious experience!
>
>  Anyway, there is one advantage to using tape, the entities seem capable of
> changing the messages as needed. I can use the same recording over an over,
> and I swear, I get meaningful, having to do with the moment on every
> listening. Brain matrixing--perhaps- -or does it really change? I can't
> tell.
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
>
>
>  On Fri, Jun 5, 2009 at 3:58 AM, eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co.
> uk <eamonnmgherbi@...>> wrote:
>
>>
>>
>>   Hi All
>>
>> I have to admit that I share the same opinion as Bruce. I dont what
>> everyones take is on this but I felt that some of moon and even Franks
>> attitude was slightly arrogant. I am a researcher in the UK using old reel
>> to reel methods and obtaining excellent results. I lost some family and some
>> close friends 5 yeara ago and suddenly it dawned on me...what is life all
>> about. I went on to research every evp pioneer i could, listen to hours/days
>> of recordings and it changed my outlook on life. tears were turned to smiles
>> and then I realised what all this research is for. it was a big step for me
>> spiritually.
>>
>> I dont know if there is anyone else on here using old fashioned methods
>> but if anybody would like to hear recordings please ask. I am using a reel
>> to reel sony "Hi frequency" recorder and trying various types of tones,
>> backgrounds e.t.c.
>>
>> Good luck to everyone with their research, you are right we are changing
>> history we are discovering new things. if it wasnt for individuals such as
>> raudive, jurghenson to name a few, maybe we wouldnt have discovered this. it
>> takes a brave individual to tackle an arrogant human race blunted with
>> science.
>>
>> Kind Regards
>>
>> The quiet one :-)
>>

>> sumption I will go no further!
>>
>>  *Sorry to hear this Bruce, I sure hope things get better,  I had no idea
>> there were so many problems when I joined all these lists,  I think you are
>> all great people, you folks together are making history don't you all
>> realize this?  There are so many people out there that have never heard of
>> this type of communication, thousands out there!  My friend just lost her
>> mother a couple of weeks ago, when I told her about the work you all are
>> doing, tears were replaced with a smile, she is looking forward to hearing
>> from her mom now too.  Stop trying to hurt each other, it's not worth it,
>> life is too short for this stuff.  You are all great people, May God Bless
>> You All ~ And He Already Has,*
>> *sf*
>>
>>  In a message dated 6/4/2009 2:27:06 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
>> balllan94@yahoo. com writes:
>>
>>
>>
>> guys,
>>
>> Sorry to burden you with this nonsense but this group and the RTSC group
>> are my only venues to respond to posts on other groups and have my account
>> heard, I hope you do not mind to much.
>>
>> Here is a copy of my final personal e-mail to Frank Sumption which by the
>> way is meant for him but he see's fit to post them publicly in an attempt to
>> discredit me.
>>
>> I want you to read it first hand so there are no chance of it being
>> altered before it is posted else where.
>>
>> I will not address Frank again
>> ------------ --------- --------- --------- --------- --------- -
>>
>> Frank,
>>
>> This is getting ridiculous now, you should stop writing these posts, all
>> you are doing is making yourself look ridiculous.
>>
>> I have offered many times to make my raw recordings available for review
>> by anyone who wants them. I have made the same challenge to your friend moon
>> who we all know is behind this tirade he has time and again refused or
>> ignored the request for any type of audio file
>> to be publicly posted for revue and continues to take advantage of
>> innocent unsuspecting people with his con game and charging large amounts of
>> money for sessions where he fabricates and makes up content as he goes
>> along.
>>
>> I was the only one to confront him in public and expose him for the fake
>> he is and this is his feeble attempt at retaliation. I and other researchers
>> like me have brought this research light years from where it was when you
>> and I first met, moon just continues to use it to rip people off and has not
>> contributed a thing to the research of ghost box communication beside lining
>> his own pockets.
>>
>> Just the fact that he has you doing his dirty work shows the type of guy
>> he is. I can remember a time when you publicly came out against any type of
>> money making using your boxes and even refused moon when he wanted to
>> manufacture and sell them for large profits yet now you condone his robbery
>> of innocent unaware people and actually act foolish on his behest.
>>
>> Frank you are better than this, just concentrate on developing a better
>> box and forget about moon and his tricks and lies, he is finished in the
>> paranormal and he knows it, everyone is wise to his game and he is
>> practically an outcast.
>>
>> Frank you are hitching you wagon to a dead horse. Get away from these bad
>> influences before they ruin your reputation as well.
>>
>> We have had this moon discussion in the past and once he has exhausted his
>> need for you he will screw you again like he has done so many times before.
>>
>> Frank, I like and respect you and I hope you will consider what I have
>> said in this e-mail and I sincerely hope you post this one on the evp-itc
>> group. I will be posting it on my group and others I belong to.
>>
>> Your former friend
>> Bruce
>>
>>
